mapper.select: SELECT b.* FROM (SELECT ROWNUM rn, a.* FROM (SELECT pdt.pdt_id, pdt.cat_id, pdt.subcat_id, pdt.brd_id, pdt.gender_id, pdt.pdt_nm, pdt.pdt_price, pdt.pdt_img, pdt.pdt_views, brd.brd_nm FROM product pdt left outer join brand brd on pdt.brd_id = brd.brd_id where pdt.subcat_id = #{subcat_id} ORDER BY pdt.pdt_id) a WHERE ROWNUM <= ${page} * 9) b WHERE b.rn > (${page} - 1) * 9

SELECT b.* FROM (SELECT ROWNUM rn, a.* FROM (SELECT pdt.pdt_id, pdt.cat_id, pdt.subcat_id, pdt.brd_id, pdt.gender_id, pdt.pdt_nm, pdt.pdt_price, pdt.pdt_img, pdt.pdt_views, brd.brd_nm FROM product pdt left outer join brand brd on pdt.brd_id = brd.brd_id where pdt.cat_id = #{cat_id} ORDER BY pdt.pdt_id) a WHERE ROWNUM <= ${page} * 9) b WHERE b.rn > (${page} - 1) * 9

SELECT b.* FROM (SELECT ROWNUM rn, a.* FROM (SELECT pdt.pdt_id, pdt.cat_id, pdt.subcat_id, pdt.brd_id, pdt.gender_id, pdt.pdt_nm, pdt.pdt_price, pdt.pdt_img, pdt.pdt_views, brd.brd_nm FROM product pdt left outer join brand brd on pdt.brd_id = brd.brd_id where pdt.gender_id = #{genderId} ORDER BY pdt.pdt_id) a WHERE ROWNUM <= ${page} * 9) b WHERE b.rn > (${page} - 1) * 9

SELECT b.* FROM (SELECT ROWNUM rn, a.* FROM (SELECT pdt.pdt_id, pdt.cat_id, pdt.subcat_id, pdt.brd_id, pdt.gender_id, pdt.pdt_nm, pdt.pdt_price, pdt.pdt_img, pdt.pdt_views, brd.brd_nm FROM product pdt left outer join brand brd on pdt.brd_id = brd.brd_id ORDER BY pdt.pdt_id) a WHERE ROWNUM <= ${page} * 9) b WHERE b.rn > (${page} - 1) * 9
mapper.insert: insert into product (pdt_id, cat_id, subcat_id, pdt_nm, pdt_price, pdt_img) values(product__seq.nextval, #{catId}, #{subcatId}, #{pdtPrice}, #{pdtImg}, #{pdtBrand})
mapper.update: update product set pdtViews=hit_count+1 where pdt_id=#{pdtId}
